problem_names:
lemma dg_CAT_components:
  shows "dg_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> = set {\<CC>. category \<alpha> \<CC>}"
    and "dg_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Arr\<rparr> = all_cfs \<alpha>"
    and "dg_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Dom\<rparr> = (\<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>. \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>)"
    and "dg_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Cod\<rparr> = (\<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>. \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>)"

lemma [dg_CAT_simps]:
  assumes "\<FF> \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> all_cfs \<alpha>"  
  shows dg_CAT_Dom_app: "dg_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Dom\<rparr>\<lparr>\<FF>\<rparr> = \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>"
    and dg_CAT_Cod_app: "dg_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Cod\<rparr>\<lparr>\<FF>\<rparr> = \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>"
translations:
lemma dg_CAT_components:
  shows "dg_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> = set {\<CC>. category \<alpha> \<CC>}"
    and "dg_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Arr\<rparr> = all_cfs \<alpha>"
    and "dg_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Dom\<rparr> = (\<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>. \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>)"
    and "dg_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Cod\<rparr> = (\<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>. \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (dg_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> =
     ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<CC>. category \<alpha> \<CC>} &&&
     dg_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Arr\<rparr> = all_cfs \<alpha>) &&&
    dg_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Dom\<rparr> =
    (\<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
        \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>) &&&
    dg_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Cod\<rparr> =
    (\<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
        \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ([ZFC_in_HOL.set (Collect (category \<alpha>)), all_cfs \<alpha>,
      \<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
         \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>,
      \<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
         \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>[]\<^sub>\<circ>\<rparr> =
     ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<CC>. category \<alpha> \<CC>} &&&
     [ZFC_in_HOL.set (Collect (category \<alpha>)), all_cfs \<alpha>,
      \<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
         \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>,
      \<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
         \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>1\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr> =
     all_cfs \<alpha>) &&&
    [ZFC_in_HOL.set (Collect (category \<alpha>)), all_cfs \<alpha>,
     \<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
        \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>,
     \<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
        \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>2\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr> =
    (\<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
        \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>) &&&
    [ZFC_in_HOL.set (Collect (category \<alpha>)), all_cfs \<alpha>,
     \<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
        \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>,
     \<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
        \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>3\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr> =
    (\<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
        \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>)

lemma [dg_CAT_simps]:
  assumes "\<FF> \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> all_cfs \<alpha>"  
  shows dg_CAT_Dom_app: "dg_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Dom\<rparr>\<lparr>\<FF>\<rparr> = \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>"
    and dg_CAT_Cod_app: "dg_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Cod\<rparr>\<lparr>\<FF>\<rparr> = \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<FF> \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> all_cfs \<alpha>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. dg_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Dom\<rparr>\<lparr>\<FF>\<rparr> =
    \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr> &&&
    dg_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Cod\<rparr>\<lparr>\<FF>\<rparr> =
    \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<FF> \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> all_cfs \<alpha>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
        \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr>)\<lparr>\<FF>\<rparr> =
    \<FF>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr> &&&
    (\<lambda>\<FF>\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>all_cfs \<alpha>.
        \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>)\<lparr>\<FF>\<rparr> =
    \<FF>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr>

proof (state)
goal (11 subgoals):
 1. \<Z> \<beta>
 2. vfsequence (dg_CAT \<alpha>)
 3. vsv (dg_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Dom\<rparr>)
 4. vsv (dg_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Cod\<rparr>)
 5. vcard (dg_CAT \<alpha>) = 4\<^sub>\<nat>
 6. \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> (dg_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Dom\<rparr>) =
    dg_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Arr\<rparr>
 7. \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> (dg_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Dom\<rparr>)
    \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> dg_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr>
 8. \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> (dg_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Cod\<rparr>) =
    dg_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Arr\<rparr>
 9. \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> (dg_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Cod\<rparr>)
    \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> dg_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr>
 10. dg_CAT \<alpha>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> Vset \<beta>
A total of 11 subgoals...
